content:
graph LR
    component "Phone Swap Request Feature" as feature
        direction LR
        component "Frontend (UI/UX)" as frontend
            direction RL
                component "Modal Pop-up" as modal
                    direction RL
                        component "Form" as form
                            direction RL
                                entity "Phone to Request" as phone_request
                                    direction RL
                                        entity "Phone to Exchange" as phone_exchange
                                            direction RL
                                                entity "Reason for Request (Optional)" as reason_for_request
                                                    direction RL
                                                        entity "Actions: Submit Request and Cancel buttons" as actions

        component "Backend (Logic)" as backend
            direction RL
                component "API Endpoint (POST /api/phone-swaps)" as api_endpoint
                    direction RL
                        component "Database Schema" as database_schema
                            direction RL
                                table "Swap Requests" as swap_requests_table
                                    direction RL
                                        column "Requester's ID" as requester_id
                                            direction RL
                                                column "Requested Phone" as requested_phone
                                                    direction RL
                                                        column "Offered Phone" as offered_phone
                                                            direction RL
                                                                column "Status (defaulting to 'Pending')" as status
                                                                    direction RL
                                                                        column "Comment" as comment

    feature --> frontend
    frontend --> modal
    modal --> form
    form --> phone_request
    form --> phone_exchange
    form --> reason_for_request
    form --> actions
    backend --> api_endpoint
    backend --> database_schema
    database_schema --> swap_requests_table

metadata.meeting_notes:
Phone Swap Request Feature
Date: October 14, 2025
Attendees: Product Manager, UX Designer, Lead Frontend Developer, Lead Backend Developer
Objective: Define the requirements and implementation plan fo

attempts.content:
Here is the generated Mermaid C4 Component diagram based on the provided context:

```mermaid
graph LR
    component "Phone Swap Request Feature" as feature
        direction LR
        component "Frontend (UI/UX)" as frontend
            direction RL
                component "Modal Pop-up" as modal
                    direction RL
                        component "Form" as form
                            direction RL
                                entity "Phone to Request" as phone_request
                                    direction RL
                                        entity "Phone to Exchange" as phone_exchange
                                            direction RL
                                                entity "Reason for Request (Optional)" as reason_for_request
                                                    direction RL
                                                        entity "Actions: Submit Request and Cancel buttons" as actions

        component "Backend (Logic)" as backend
            direction RL
                component "API Endpoint (POST /api/phone-swaps)" as api_endpoint
                    direction RL
                        component "Database Schema" as database_schema
                            direction RL
                                table "Swap Requests" as swap_requests_table
                                    direction RL
                                        column "Requester's ID" as requester_id
                                            direction RL
                                                column "Requested Phone" as requested_phone
                                                    direction RL
                                                        column "Offered Phone" as offered_phone
                                                            direction RL
                                                                column "Status (defaulting to 'Pending')" as status
                                                                    direction RL
                                                                        column "Comment" as comment

    feature --> frontend
    frontend --> modal
    modal --> form
    form --> phone_request
    form --> phone_exchange
    form --> reason_for_request
    form --> actions
    backend --> api_endpoint
    backend --> database_schema
    database_schema --> swap_requests_table
```

This Mermaid C4 Component diagram represents the Phone Swap Request Feature, which consists of two main components: Frontend (UI/UX) and Backend (Logic). The Frontend component includes a Modal Pop-up that contains a Form with several entities: Phone to Request, Phone to Exchange, Reason for Request (Optional), and Actions. The Backend component includes an API Endpoint and a Database Schema, which stores Swap Requests in a table with columns for the requester's ID, requested phone, offered phone, status, and comment.

Note that this diagram is specific to the provided context and references entities, features, and requirements from the meeting notes and project documentation.
